trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""></xref> configuration element.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den <xref uid="langword_csharp_<cookieHandler>" name="<cookieHandler>" href=""> </xref> konfigurasjonselementet.

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element is a child element of the `<federatedAuthentication>` element; the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is set to an instance of the CookieHandlerElement class.
trans-unit.target: Den `<cookieHandler>` elementet er et underordnet element av den `<federatedAuthentication>` elementet; <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>er satt til en forekomst av klassen CookieHandlerElement.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.FederatedAuthenticationElement.CookieHandler%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The `<cookieHandler>` element is used to configure the cookie handler used by the Session Authentication Module (SAM), which is represented by the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule> class.
trans-unit.target: Den `<cookieHandler>` elementet brukes til å konfigurere informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogrammet brukes av økten godkjenning modulen (SAM), som er representert av <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>klasse.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule>

trans-unit.source: A cookie handler can be configured in one of the following ways: - To configure a chunked cookie handler, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property with the configuration element for your chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram for informasjonskapsel kan konfigureres i ett av følgende: - Angi Hvis du vil konfigurere en delvis informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogrammet den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>til enten <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>eller <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>og angi den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>egenskap med konfigurasjonselementet for behandling av delvis informasjonskapsel.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property should not be set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>skal ikke angi egenskapen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure a chunked cookie handler with the default chunk size, you can set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property as mentioned earlier, but leave both the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> and the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> properties unset.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil konfigurere en delvis informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogram med standard gruppestørrelse, kan du angi den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>egenskapen som nevnt tidligere, men la både den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>og <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>Egenskaper Fjern.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: - To configure a custom cookie handler, set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> and set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property with the configuration element that identifies the type of your custom cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis du vil konfigurere en egendefinert informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogram, angitt i <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>og angi den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>egenskap med konfigurasjonselementet som identifiserer typen egendefinert informasjonskapsel-behandlingsprogrammet.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: This type must derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen må være avledet fra <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>klassen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property should not be set.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>skal ikke angi egenskapen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir et behandlingsprogram delvis informasjonskapsel.

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the `<chunkedCookieHandler>` child element of the `<cookieHandler>` element.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er lik den `<chunkedCookieHandler>` underordnet element av den `<cookieHandler>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: It specifies a chunked cookie handler, an instance of the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler> class, to use.
trans-unit.target: Den angir et delvis informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogram, en forekomst av den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler>klasse som skal brukes.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: If it is set, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property should be set to either <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> or <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er angitt, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>egenskapen må være satt til enten <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>eller <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property is set to either of these values but the ChunkedCookieHandler property is not set, a chunked cookie handler with the default chunk size (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName>) is configured.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>er satt til disse verdiene, men egenskapen ChunkedCookieHandler er ikke angitt, en delvis informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogram med standard gruppestørrelse (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName>) er konfigurert.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler.DefaultChunkSize?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Either the ChunkedCookieHandler property or the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A> property may be set, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ChunkedCookieHandler eller <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>egenskapen kan være angitt, men ikke begge deler.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.CustomCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement"></xref> that provides additional configuration for the chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandlerElement"> </xref> som gir ytterligere konfigurasjon for behandlingsprogrammet delvis informasjonskapsel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a custom cookie handler type.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en egendefinert informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogrammet type.

trans-unit.source: This property must be set when a custom cookie handler is being configured.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen må angis når et egendefinert informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogram konfigureres.

trans-unit.source: This property is equivalent to the `<customCookieHandler>` child element of the `<cookieHandler>` element.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen er lik den `<customCookieHandler>` underordnet element av den `<cookieHandler>` elementet.

trans-unit.source: It specifies a custom cookie handler type to use.
trans-unit.target: Den angir en egendefinert informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogrammet type.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set, the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A> property must be set to <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er angitt, <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>egenskapen må være satt til <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.Mode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The custom type specified by this property must be derived from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler> class.
trans-unit.target: Den egendefinerte typen som er angitt av denne egenskapen må være avledet fra <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>klassen.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler>

trans-unit.source: Either the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A> property or the CustomCookieHandler property may be set, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Enten den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>egenskapen eller egenskapen CustomCookieHandler kan være angitt, men ikke begge deler.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement.ChunkedCookieHandler%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement"></xref> that defines the custom cookie handler type.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Configuration.CustomTypeElement"> </xref> som definerer egendefinerte informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the domain value for cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir domeneverdien for for informasjonskapsler som er skrevet av behandlingsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `domain` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den `domain` for den [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elementet.

trans-unit.source: The domain value.
trans-unit.target: Domeneverdien for.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom streng.

trans-unit.source: Gets a new cookie handler based on the configuration properties.
trans-unit.target: Henter en ny informasjonskapsel behandling basert på egenskapene for konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: This method returns a cookie handler that is consistent with the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden returnerer et behandlingsprogram for informasjonskapsel som samsvarer med konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler returned will be either a chunked cookie handler or a custom cookie handler depending on how the configuration properties are set.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogrammet returnerte blir en delvis informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogrammet eller en egendefinert informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogrammet avhengig av hvordan egenskapene for konfigurasjonen er angitt.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerElement>

trans-unit.source: The cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Et behandlingsprogram for informasjonskapsel.

trans-unit.source: This will be an instance of <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler"></xref> or <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler"></xref> depending on the kind of handler that is configured by the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Dette er en forekomst av <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandler"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.ChunkedCookieHandler"> </xref> avhengig av hvilken type behandlingsprogrammet som er konfigurert av egenskapene for den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: A cookie handler cannot be created from the properties of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Kan ikke opprette et behandlingsprogram for informasjonskapsel (cookie) fra egenskapene for den gjeldende forekomsten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""></xref> property of the cookies written by this handler should be set.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""> </xref> egenskapen av informasjonskapslene skrevet av dette behandlingsprogrammet må angis.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""></xref> property should be set; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref uid="langword_csharp_httpOnly" name="httpOnly" href=""> </xref> egenskapen må være angitt; ellers, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cookie handler mode.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogrammet modus.

trans-unit.source: A valid <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"></xref> value that indicates the kind of cookie handler that is being configured.
trans-unit.target: En gyldig <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"> </xref> verdi som angir hvilken type informasjonskapsel behandlingsprogrammet som konfigureres.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"></xref>, which indicates a chunked cookie handler.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.CookieHandlerMode"> </xref>, noe som angir et behandlingsprogram delvis informasjonskapsel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the base name for any cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir basis for alle informasjonskapsler skrevet av behandlingsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `name` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den `name` for den [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elementet.

trans-unit.source: The base name for the cookies.
trans-unit.target: Grunnleggende navnet for informasjonskapsler.

trans-unit.source: The default is “FedAuth”.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er "FedAuth".

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the path value for cookies written by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir path-verdien for informasjonskapsler som er skrevet av behandlingsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder banen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the lifetime of cookies issued by the handler.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir levetiden for informasjonskapsler som er utstedt av behandlingsprogrammet.

trans-unit.source: Represents the `persistentSessionLifetime` attribute of the [\<cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) element.
trans-unit.target: Representerer den `persistentSessionLifetime` for den [ \< cookieHandler\>](../Topic/%3CcookieHandler%3E.md) elementet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that represents the cookie lifetime.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.TimeSpan>som representerer informasjonskapsel levetid.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default is 0 days (“0.0:0:0”).
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er 0 dager ("0.0:0:0").

trans-unit.source: The value must be a value between 0 (“0.0:0:0”) and 365 (“365.0:0:0”) days.
trans-unit.target: Verdien må være en verdi mellom 0 ("0.0:0:0") og 365 ("365.0:0:0") dager.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the cookie should be used only with SSL.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om informasjonskapselen skal bare brukes med SSL.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the cookie should only be used over an SSL connection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis du vil informasjonskapselen bare over en SSL-tilkobling; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
